cleaned_text: A Personalized Integrative Medical Consultation in person, on the phone, or via video conference. Dr. LePine has many tools in his medical toolbox to help you get healthy and get to the bottom of complex, puzzling symptoms. By appointment only. Move to the head of the line! The One Year VIP Health Pass gives you private access to Dr. LePine. Receive quick access for 1 year to Dr. LePine for expert health advice and guidance along with an annual comprehensive nutritional/metabolic test profile to maximize your health and vitality. Lumen's patent-pending technology accurately measures metabolic fuel usage to let you know if your body is burning fat or carbohydrates to help you lose weight.
